meanings.definition: To make international in character or scope.
meanings.sent1: The company internationalizes its products by selling them in different countries.
meanings.sent2: The organization internationalizes its operations to reach a global audience.
meanings.sent3: The chef internationalizes the menu by adding dishes from various countries.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for travel internationalizes her perspective on different cultures.
meanings.sent5: The music festival internationalizes the local community, attracting visitors from around the world.

meanings.definition: To extend to or involve other countries or nations.
meanings.sent1: The treaty internationalizes the conflict by bringing in neighboring countries.
meanings.sent2: The company internationalizes its supply chain to include suppliers from different nations.
meanings.sent3: The school project internationalizes the students' understanding of global issues.
meanings.sent4: His influence internationalizes the debate, drawing in viewpoints from various countries.
meanings.sent5: The pandemic internationalizes the healthcare response, requiring collaboration among nations.
